text: Chishiki no nai-sha-tachi wa,`arra wa, naze watashi-tachi ni hanashikake rarezu, mata shirushi o kudasa renai nodarou.' To iu. Izen ni mo kare-ra no yo ni iu mono ga ita. Kare-ra no kokoro wa onajiyona monodearu. Shikkari shita shinko o motsu hitobito ni wa, ware wa shuju no shirushi o sudeni meiji shite iru
